document.full_text: for the first time in nearly 140 years, the indian tribes of northeastern montana are preparing for the return of wild buffalo that are descended from herds that once thundered across the vast american west.
document.title: montana tribes ready for historic return of buffalo
lines_and_colors: for the first time in nearly 140 years, the indian tribes of northeastern montana are preparing for the return of wild buffalo that are descended from herds that once thundered across the vast american west.
